revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Encore |model=ENHWI-3GN3 |revision= |upc=810731011448 |ean= |asin=B004VCWERK |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/27/2009 |manuf_country= |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=common |type=wireless router |fcc_id=U2M-SR97908005 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.25 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Ralink |cpu1_model=RT3050 |cpu1_cspeed=320 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip1_model=RT3050 |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |wan_ports=1 |flags=3G capable |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=ENCOREXXXXXX |default_ssid_regex=^ENCORE[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:02:6F |oui_eth=00:02:6F }} ''3G Mobile Broadband Wireless N150 Router plus Repeater''
[http://www.encore-usa.com/th/product/ENHWI-3GN3 Product page], [http://www.encore-usa.com/th/support/ENHWI-3GN3 Support page], [http://www.encore-usa.com/us/sites/default/files/product_documents/ENHWI-2AN3_UM.pdf Manual] The default SSID is "ENCOREXXXXXX" where "XXXXXX" is the last 3 octets of the wireless interface MAC address. The stock firmware allows for up to four separate SSID's. By default, they are ENCOREXXXXXX_2, ENCOREXXXXXX_3, and ENCOREXXXXXX_4. Each ID can have separate security settings.
